tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Obama took over with a debt of 9 trillion, he said he would cut it in half by the end of his first term, its at 16 trillion now, given he is in two wars that is hard to do. But that tells me he said that lying to get votes or he really thought he could with two wars, if thats the case﻿ hes not very smart

Let's not forget bush served two terms so﻿ wut makes u think that u can change anything. Wut u Gonna do vote for romney u people just dont get it our constitution says the people can take the country back but for some reason all i see is complaints and rude comments, stop talking shit and take your country back
dumbest comment EVER..... Latinos hate Castro.﻿ You clearly have no idea what you are talking about.

Obama's record:﻿ Unemployment above 8%, real unemployment 15%, added $5 trillion to the national debt in only 4 years, surged troops in Afghanistan, did not close Guantanamo bay, failed by﻿ doing nothing in Syria, Obamacare is now Obamatax on the middle class, took $716 billion dollars out of Medicare and into a failed entitlement program, illegally entered the war in Libya without congressional approval, failed energy subsidies, failed economic record. How can you vote for this man again?
They already have an issue with all the﻿ skin she's been showing.
Shut the fuck﻿ up,faggot

Obama's record:﻿ Unemployment above 8%, real unemployment 15%, added $5 trillion to the national﻿ debt in only 4 years, surged troops in Afghanistan, did not close Guantanamo bay, failed by doing nothing in Syria, Obamacare is now Obamatax on the middle class, took $716 billion dollars out of Medicare and into a failed entitlement program, illegally entered the war in Libya without congressional approval, failed energy subsidies, failed economic record. How can you vote for this man again?
This woman is amazing..﻿
Can't wait to hear﻿ the President's speech. I wonder if it will top the First Lady's speech. To be continued.......
don't forget he bombed three﻿ countries(drone strikes) with Syria currently pending.
all this and obama still don't give a damn for his poor brother in Kenya living on a dollar a day!! don't﻿ vote for him﻿ go Romney Ryan 2012 - America's Comeback Team
You﻿ shut the fuck up, faggot.
Okay, shut up and vote for your savior Romney, the one who is itching to start a war﻿ with Iran.
Brilliantly done﻿
4 more years.﻿
"Because for Barrack, success isn't about the money you make, its about the difference you make in peoples lives".﻿ - Words by Michelle Obama.
NO ONE CAN﻿ TOP THIS SPEECH. GAME OVER. GO OBAMA!
His speech was amazing as﻿ well.
POWERFUL!﻿

Obama's record:﻿ Unemployment﻿ above 8%, real unemployment 15%, added $5 trillion to the national debt in only 4 years, surged troops in Afghanistan, did not close Guantanamo bay, failed by doing nothing in Syria, Obamacare is now Obamatax on the middle class, took $716 billion dollars out of Medicare and into a failed entitlement program, illegally entered the war in Libya without congressional approval, failed energy subsidies, failed economic record. How can you vote for this man again?

Obama's record:﻿ Unemployment above 8%, real unemployment 15%, added $5 trillion to the national debt in only 4 years, surged troops in Afghanistan, did not close Guantanamo bay, failed by doing nothing in Syria, Obamacare is now Obamatax on the middle class, took $716 billion dollars out of Medicare and into a failed entitlement program, illegally entered the war in Libya without congressional approval, failed energy subsidies, failed economic record. You're an idiot.﻿
What a wonderful﻿ speech from a wonderful first lady.
she's truly an inspiration, what an incredible﻿ speech! and I say this as someone who's not American. Everything she said was dead on and it shows how strong Michelle Obama is.

Are you serious? You mean because she was choked up? Everything she said was positive towards this country. You must be one﻿ of those people who, if they can't find something wrong, has to make one up to feel happy.
Thank you for saying what you did! Michelle Obama is an amazing﻿ woman and I am praying that Barack gets a second term. It would be a shame if he doesn't!
